transcript.text: Luke here at the outo boys YouTube
channel and we're back for another
Homestead Adventure few months ago I
bought this Homestead and found that it
was full of abandoned equipment
equipment's been breaking down buildings
have been catching on fire and we've
been breaking our backs trying to build
a road through the swamp but I've got a
feeling now things are about to turn a
corner well it's been several weeks
since I figured out the road I was
building wasn't completely on my
property and I have to admit that was a
bit of a low point
however I figured out a solution to my
problems so I went to the tax records
and figured out who owned the property
that my road was on and I went to the
owner and explained to him what I did I
said I would move the road buy an
easement or buy their property outright
so now I own two properties in the
interior of Alaska while this was not
what I was originally planning I think
it might be a blessing in disguise all
this money I've spent improving this
Trail is is going to raise the property
values of all the properties that need
this Trail for Access so now I've just
doubled my investment at least that's
what I told my
[Laughter]
[Applause]
wife got a friend here who's going to
give us a
ride well for the last week we've been
having a neighbor M digging gravel out
of this Hillside stock pilot so we can
put it on top of that bone rock that
we've been laying down now this material
has a lot of clay in it so it doesn't
drain water very well and can get really
muddy and soupy but the bone Rock drains
water really well so when you put this
on top of the bone rock it keeps the
bone Rock from moving around and the
bone Rock helps keep this
dry what do you think it's good to see
isn't it so much better
we get that clay with rocks in it over
the top and this will be a joy to walk
on thank you
so sorry man I hope I wasn't keeping you
waiting well guys I uh I might have done

myself an imported Japanese K

carry and it's uh been modified for

got allterrain treads on it incredible

four-wheel drive high and low off-road
lights and it's got an oil pan and
engine block heater and of course an
extra tall cab on the back and this
thing is imported from Japan so uh the
steering wheel's on the right hand
side big man in a little truck look
Becca I'm a truck guy
now
is it true that women find pickup guys
more sexy cuz looking good yeah it's
lifted

cute actually can I sit in it real fast
I haven't been in it

go pick up the kids yeah we

year
round one of the first things I want to
